title: Energy Aromatherapy Moisturizing Lotion | Moisturizing Lotion
description: This energy aromatherapy 100% plant based preservative hand and body moisturizing lotion has a refreshing, minty fragrance, clean, citrus, sharp citrus aroma with a woody sweet undertone. This moisturizing lotion leaves a beautiful scent when moisturizing your skin. You will love how it leaves your skin feeling soft!
